Masterminds weave long-ranged plots to see their nefarious goals come to fruition, deftly manipulating those around them, turning enemies into friends and then pitting them against one another. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 19 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 [Mastermind](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3612) **Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 156 **Perception** +10; (17 to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=2302)) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); two additional languages **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +15, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +15, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) +17, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +11, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +9, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +17 **Str** +0 **Dex** +3 **Con** +0 **Int** +4 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +4 **Manipulation Specialist** When competing in a social or intellectual arena, the mastermind is a 7th-level challenge.
**Versatile Performance** The mastermind can use [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) instead of [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=2392) and instead of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=2388). **Items** [Disguise Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43) --- **AC** 20 **Fort** +6 **Ref** +11 **Will** +16 **HP** 55 --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** shortsword +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d6+6 slashing **Melee** fist +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning **Ranged** hand crossbow +13 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6+6 piercing **Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 22, attack +14 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286) - **1st** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) (3 slots) - **2nd** [Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214) (3 slots) **Bard Composition Spells** DC 22 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Courageous Anthem](/Spells.aspx?ID=1763), [Uplifting Overture](/Spells.aspx?ID=1779) **Scoundrel's Feint** When the mastermind successfully [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390), the target is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against the mastermind's melee attacks until the end of the mastermind's next turn. On a critical success, the target is off-guard against all melee attacks for that time, not just the mastermind's. **Sneak Attack** The mastermind deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.
